title: CSSExercises

If you haven't already,

to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.
As a logged on  user you will have access to many features like having
your own web page
,
track your learning progress
,
receive personal guided paths
, and
more
.
The Exercise
The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. 
There are between 3 and 9 questions in  each catergory.
The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, 
or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.

summary: This tutorial covers CSSExercises concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use CSSExercises effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of CSSExercises and how to apply it in your projects.
